verbose_text: We hypothesized that external administration of adenosine has an anti-inflammatory and amendatory effect on the colon which was damaged by acetic acid treatment, probably through modulating the tissue levels of nuclear factor kappa B (NF-kB) and TNF-alpha, and the plasma levels of lipid peroxidation and pentraxin-3 (PTX3).
evidence: levels of nuclear factor kappa B (NF-kB) and TNF-alpha
